title: VCMI town building format
description: Format used to define town buildings in VCMI

items.description: First item that indicates type of following expression

additionalItems.description: Following items that contain expression elements

mode.description: Mode in which this building will be built

height.description: Height for lookout towers and some grails

requires.description: List of town buildings that must be built before this one

upgrades.description: Optional, indicates that this building upgrades another base building

upgradeReplacesBonuses.description: If set to true, this building will replace all bonuses from base building, leaving only bonuses defined by this building

configuration.description: Optional, configuration of building that can be activated by visiting hero

produce.description: Resources produced each day by this building

bonuses.description: Bonuses that are provided by this building in any town where this building has been built. Only affects town itself (including siege), to propagate effect to player or team please use bonus propagators
